content: next st 1 half_double_crochet in next 15 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 107 sts round 24 1 half_double_crochet in each st around total 107 sts round 25 1 single_crochet in each st around total 107 sts use an invisible fasten_off if you need help with the invisible fasten_off check out my tutorial link below weave in the ends congratulations you are finished you made it how summertime fun is that follow me here youtube https //youtube com/@crochetandcopy ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/crochetandcopy pinterest https //pin it/x5kanby instagram https //www instagram com/invites/contact/ i=1o9z4a0ba9njs&utm_content=mhvk8te @crochet&copy x https //twitter com/crochetandcopy t=fm7hjmbncdwyhbyqvbbnha&s=09 if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/wgq87mt6yno si=cc2uygw3kuthtnp1
